p: Antimicrobial resistance is a worldwide phenomenon, exacerbated in low socio-economic countries [ 16]. This is borne out in our limited case series.Â All organisms cultured were resistant to penicillin and most were resistant to ampicillin as well. This finding is important in that a recent review on DNSI advocated for the use of penicillin in combination with ampicillin/ clavulanic acid as empiric therapy [ 5].
